translations: v．复制，重复：指对某事物进行复制或重复，通常用于书面材料。
· She dittoed the docu we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  for the meeting.
她为会议复制了这份文件。

phrs.translation: [口语]同意…的意见，对…表示同意，赞成(某种观点)

sentences.sentence: She dittoed my argu we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao .
The next speaker dittoed her argu we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao .
sentences.translation: 接下来的演说者又重复了她的论点。
